metadata.title: CVE-2018-25078 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: man-db before 2.8.5 on Gentoo allows local users (with access to the manuser account) to gain root privileges because /usr/bin/mandb is executed byroot but not owned by root. (Also, the owner can strip the setuid andsetgid bits.)

criterions.comment: man-db: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
